import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import logo from "../../Images/logo.png"; import "./Navbar.css"; import axios from "axios"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const Navbar = () => { const [query, setQuery] = useState(""); const navigate = useNavigate(); const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); navigate(`/query/${query}`); }; return (
setQuery(e.target.value)} />

); }; export default Navbar;
